props.Description: Trees will sprout new Saplings randomly.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Grants target Rage {1} - making it accumulate Rage counters upon each hit taken, which in turn increase Damage, Initiative and Spellpower at the cost of reduced Defense and potential Berserk behavior.
You and all your summoned beasts gain {1} Rage counters. Enemies within 2 cell range lose up to {2} Morale

props.Name: Call of the Wild
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Entangle: Naturalize
props.Description: Target unit loses ability to move and {1}% of its Defense. Lasts {2} turns;

props.Name: Dominate Beast
props.Description: Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}% for {2} turns.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Deals {1} Air damage to an adjacent unit. Reflex roll won by the target reduces damage by half.
Increases target's Vitality and Strength by {1}%, Weight by twice the amount, adds Trample and makes the unit Huge. Lasts for {2} turns.

props.Name: Feral Mark: Charge
props.Description: Increases target's Agility and Dexterity by {1}% for {2} turns.

props.Name: Neutralize Poison
props.Description: Removes up to {1} Poison counters

props.Name: Stabilize
props.Description: Removes up to {1} Bleeding counters

props.Name: Remedy
props.Description: Removes up to {1} Disease and Corrosion counters

props.Name: Sting
props.Dev_Notes: Ideally, it should only block moving/attacking, and give Cut Loose action.
props.Description: Shoots a poisoned needle at a target.

props.Name: Insect Swarm
props.Dev_Notes: Ideally, it should only block moving/attacking, and give Cut Loose action.
props.Description: Shoots a poisoned needle at a target.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Creates an impassible ground obstacle. If the cell is occupied, caster must win a roll of Spellpower against Weight for each unit for Collision rule to be applied (unit will be displaced randomly).

props.Name: Clay Blob
props.Dev_Notes: forcing them to make a Reflex roll against Entanglement

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: A blob of clay is thrown at the target, dealing minor Bludgeoning damage and putting {2} Clay counters on them that will add Weight until falling off (up to 3 per round).
Units on the chosen cell will make a Reflex roll against Entanglement X after each action and round, where X equals {1}+ the unit's Weight divided by {2}.

Conjures a fearsome lance of deathly ash that pierces targets in a chosen direction, dealing {1} Death damage that cannot be healed. Units killed by the Ash Spear are Annihilated. Undead creatures are healed by Ash Spear instead.

Units within radius of {2} from the chosen cell must make a roll of Fortitude against Suffocation {1} (losing of {1}% of max Endurance and Focus) after each action they take as well as at the start of each new round.

props.Name: Solidify
props.Actives: Cont Mod Param by Const(Stone Skin,Armor,10,2,1,40)

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Converts up to {1} Clay counter into Encase counters or Grease into Clay. For each Encase counter, target gains 1 Armor, 1 Weight and loses 2% maximum Action Points, Attack and Defense. Targets with more than 50 Encase counters are made into Constructs (immune to Mind-Affecting, Poison, etc - such effects are dispeled) and Immobilized it. Encase counters will be lost when target takes Physical damage.

props.Dev_Notes: converts Clay counters into Entanglement counters

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Units on the chosen cell will receive {1} Grease counters; their Fire resistance is reduced by 3 per each, while Acid, Lightning and Cold resistances are increased by 1 and Movement Costs by 2%.

Erects a wall of solid ice on a cell with at least 500 space and 50 Moist counters (units will be encased until the wall is destroyed). Wall's maximum Toughness is equal to {2}*Freeze Counters on it and it converts up to {1} Moist counters on it (initial 50) to Freeze counters and applies {3}% of its Freeze counters to all adjacent units at the start of each new round. Units cased in the Ice Wall lose {4}% Endurance per round.
Deals {1} Piercing damage to all ground units in a 3x3 zone. Each Fissure in the area will deal {2} Slashing damage to adjacent units.

props.Name: Summon Black Wolf
props.Description: Summons a loyal wolf companion

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: (Combat only) Calls forth the spirit of Duncan's wolf companion of old - a nasty beast fit for the bloodiest work.
(Combat only) Calls forth the spirit of Duncan's wolf companion of old - a nasty beast fit for the bloodiest work.
(Combat only) Calls forth the spirit of Duncan's wolf companion of old - a nasty beast fit for the bloodiest work.
Vampire Bat with Life Steal and Darkvision, grants summoner bonus Agility while it is alive.

props.Name: Drain Life
props.Description: Drains {1} Endurance from the target.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Target receives {1} Disease counters. Each counter drains 0.2 stamina per turn and deals Poison damage equal to 0.5% of maximum Endurance.

Ai_Priority_Formula.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: [AV(Filter List Size, adjacent AND enemy AND unit)]*25+ [more][capacity] {target_c_essence}

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: For every living unit that is slain within {spell_range} from you, gain an amount of Soul Counters equal to its Level and Essence equal to {1}% of its Power. Lasts {2} turns.

Raise target corpse as a Skeleton or a Skeletal Beast. Skeleton will have the same items equipped. Each Undead minion drains some of your Essence at the start of each turn and will be destroyed if you cannot feed it. Furthermore, if your Focus drops below that which the spell required to cast, the Undead minion will become Neutral.
Grants the target Vampirism - ability to regenerate Endurance with melee attacks ({1}% of damage dealt) for {2} rounds.

props.Name: Slow Venom
props.Description: Target receives {1} Poison counters.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Use a corpse within {radius} to create a Bone Shield around target unit within {range}. The Shield will absorb up to {1} physical damage and has {?} resistance and armor.

You become Immaterial - all physical damage is affected by your Resistance while Attack/Defense/Armor values have no effect on the damage. You also become immune to Critical Attacks, while still able to Dodge strikes from low-Attack enemies. Lasts {1} rounds.
Target receives {1} bonus to Attack, but loses equal amount of its Defense. Lasts {2} rounds.

Lore.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Bolts are the simplest form of any magic, raw aspect energy hurled at an enemy...

props.Name: Death Bolt
props.Description: Deals {1} Death damage to an enemy in clear shot.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Afflicted units will add Disease counters to all adjacent units at the end of turn. Each counters deals {1} Poison damage per turn.

props.Name: Drain Life: Bleeding

props.Description: Drains {1} Endurance from the target.

props.Description: Target loses {1} ATB.

Group.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Target's initiative is modified by {1}% of its missing Endurance. Has inverse effect on Undead creatures.

props.Name: Agony
props.Description: Target loses an amount of Initiative equal to {1}% of its missing Endurance.

props.Name: Boiling Blood

Dev_Notes.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Units in a 3x3 zone become {1}% more effective to use Life Steal against and suffer that much more damage from Poison effects. They also lose Focus equal to {1}% of their current Endurance.

props.Description: Target unit with more

props.Name: Blood Channel
props.Description: Tranfers {1} Endurance from you to the target.

props.Name: Wraith Touch
props.Description: Deals {1} Death damage to an adjacent enemy.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Destroys target Skeleton and deals Piercing damage equal to {1}% of its maximum Toughness to all adjacent units. Enemy Skeletons have twice the normal chance to resist Bone Splinters, but their Death Resistance is ignored.
Blood hungry undead are more dangerouns adversaries, but also more dangerous puppets for the necromancer to handle... (will turn on you in you run out of Essence for upkeep!)

props.Name: Chilling Touch
props.Description: Deals {1} Cold damage to an adjacent enemy and applies {2} Freeze counters.

props.Name: Reaper Form
props.Description: Gain twice as many Soul counters.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Target receives an amount of Rage counters equal to {1}% of its missing Endurance (percentage).
Targets in a 3x3 zone receive {1} Disease counters. Each counter drains 0.2 stamina per turn and deals Poison damage equal to 0.5% of maximum Endurance.
Destroys target corpse and deals Physical damage equal to {1}% of its maximum Endurance to all adjacent units.

Raise target corpse as a Ghost or a Wraith Beast. Ghost will have the same spells available. Each Undead minion drains some of your Essence at the start of each turn and will be destroyed if you cannot feed it. Furthermore, if your Focus drops below that which the spell required to cast, the Undead minion will become Neutral.

Raise target corpse as its own former self with Undead classification. Each Undead minion drains some of your Essence at the start of each turn and will be destroyed if you cannot feed it. Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Destroy target unit. Its summoner receives back the amount of Essence equal to the unit's Endurance times Magical Affinity
Sends forth a ray of Arcane energies that deals {1} damage to all units in the chosen direction within {spell_range} cellsSet' distance.
Teleports target unit within {1} distance to a cell within the same distance. Enemy units will attempt a saving throw of Resistance versus Spellpower.
The air around you turned into eldritch flames, dealing {1} Arcane damage to all adjacent units.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Creates a solid barrier that blocks movement and missiles but not vision. Spellpower and Mastery increase its Endurance, Toughness, Armor and Resistances. Will be destroyed immediately on any action from the conjurer.

Description.FIRST_CHARUNICODE35CODEENDcdataUNICODE45: Choose a single-target spell to put on target weapon so that it will activate it upon each successful hit. Weapon has {X} energy and {Y} spellpower.
Target will makes a roll against Mind Affecting and if it fails, will act randomly for {2} turns. Succeeding the roll still results in {1} Action Point loss.
Choose a single-target or zone-targeting spell and create a trap that will activate it on whoever steps onto it.
Target living creature in clear shot makes a saving throw of Willpower versus {2} against mind control and becomes loyal to the caster for {spell_duration} turns if it fails.

Creates a copy of a target unit with less than {1} Power on a cell adjacent to it and swaps their positions one time out of two. The copy is identical, but will be destroyed if it takes non-triggered damage. Lasts {2} turns.
Steals {1} Initiative from the target. Adds that much time to the round's Remaining Time.
